name: meldgraphics
description: We design and develop graphical products and brands

scripts.meldgraphics: npm install && bower install && tsd install
scripts.build:dev: gulp clean && copyfiles -f ./src/video/* ./app/video && copyfiles -f ./src/fonts/* ./app/fonts && gulp base64 && gulp dev:scripts dev:styles dev:html
scripts.build:prod: gulp clean && copyfiles -f ./src/video/* ./app/video && copyfiles -f ./src/fonts/* ./app/fonts && gulp base64 && gulp prod:scripts prod:styles prod:html
scripts.start:prod: npm run build:prod && npm run serve

author: Siarhei Savitski
